import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = ({ location, history }) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return (
